argument.name: text
argument.description: A character string containing the regular expression to validate.

page.discussion: The REGEX_VALID() function tests a regular expression to determine whether or not the regular expression is valid.
page.example:
? regex_valid("[.+") = .F.
'The issue with the above failing regular expression is lack of a closing ']'.
? regex_valid("[.+]") = .T.
? regex_match(".","[.+") ERROR: Unmatched [ or [^ in character class declaration. The error occurred while parsing the regular expression: '[.+>>>HERE>>>'.
